name: Shape or Color
description:
Shape or Color – new unique twist of simple puzzle mechanics designed by Tetris® creator Alexey Pajitnov.
Touch the history! Try new puzzle from puzzle Guru!

Genius design means simple rules:
• Link pieces in a chain
• Adjacent links should be either of the same shape or color

Genius game means prefect implementation:
• 100+ challenging levels
• Easy controls
• Clean graphics and bright sounds

Warning! Extremely challenging! Highly addictive! Free your work calendar for next a couple weeks… :-)
